education.degree: Bachelor of Computer Science and Engineering

responsibilities: Build and maintain web applications for financial solutions.
Collaborate with teams to design features.
Optimize code and ensure timely delivery.

project.name: Bank Statement Analyzer (BSA)
project.description: Developed tool to enhance bank statement processing.

responsibilities: Collaborated on front-end and back-end solutions.
Built dynamic website using MongoDB and Django.

project.name: Akshaya Sivam Trust Website
project.description: Created site for trust initiatives Akshaya Sivam Trust.

projects.name: Maha Akshayam Sivam Trust Website
projects.description: Developed website for Maha Akshaya Sivam Trust to showcase their initiatives and events.

projects.name: Vortex Engine
projects.description: Vortex Engine built with Unreal Engine allows developers to create on-chain 2D and 3D games. It supports Aptos blockchain with future plans for Polygon integration.

projects.name: X3 Compiler
projects.description: Key contributor to X3 Compiler, a Python-based language for efficient smart contract deployment and interaction.

projects.name: Ticket3
projects.description: Collaborated in the creation of a decentralized ticket booking platform providing users with a secure and efficient way to book tickets for various events.

projects.name: Fake News Detection AI
projects.description: Utilized datasets and machine learning algorithms to develop an AI-powered system for detecting fake news, contributing to the fight against misinformation.

certifications: Coursera Certificate of Participation in Gencsis Blockchain
